abilities.name: Steady Advance
abilities.description: Can't attack the turn it's played. Gains +1/+1 each turn

abilities.name: Unwavering Path
abilities.description: Can't be moved or bounced by spells or abilities

body.raw:
# Knight of Pentacles

Slow and steady, the knight advances with absolute certainty.

*"The tortoise wins through persistence, not speed."*
